law.catch_line: Grain warehousemen to post copies of grain warehouse law.
law.text: Each proprietor or manager of a public grain warehouse shall keep posted at all times, in a conspicuous place in his business office and in each of his warehouses a printed copy of this chapter.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4797.
